title: Netflixâ€™s ad-supported tier could arrive by end of 2022
content:
Streaming giant Netflix recently reported a loss of subscribers for the first time in ten years. Unfortunately, that loss of nearly 200,000 subscribers looks to be just the tip of the iceberg. The company has also forecasted that things could get much worse, leading to even more user hemorrhaging somewhere in the millions in Q2.

The post Netflix’s ad-supported tier could arrive by end of 2022 appeared first on XDA.
description: Despite its past resistance to an ad-supported tier, it looks like Netflix will try and bring it to market before year's end.
